Package com.empirilytics.qatch.cli

Class BenchmarkRunner

java.lang.Object
com.empirilytics.qatch.cli.Runner
com.empirilytics.qatch.cli.BenchmarkRunner
public class BenchmarkRunner extends Runner
This class is made in order to execute the BenchmarkAnalyzer and the results importer!!!

Basically this class contains the central script of the Threshold Extractor.
